attributes.action: Sever All Diplomatic and other ties with Zimbabwe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To ask the PM to have nothing further to do with Robert Mugabe and the Govt of Zimbabwe until such time as he accepts the results of the last general election and steps down. This means severing all diplomatic, sporting and economic ties and denying any member of the Zimbabwean Govt or anyone associated with it entry into the UK even if in transit.
